pages.title: God Favors
pages.text: When completing a Vault God Altar inside The Vault, a $(l)Vault God Favor$() might be gained. $(br2)A Vault God Favor is a $(l)positive buff$() automatically applied to the next vault run, specific to the player.

pages.title: God Reputations
pages.text: A total of $(l)100 reputation points$() are available for each Vault God. The reputation of a Vault God is increased when a vault with an active Vault God Favor is completed. The higher the reputation, the higher the value of the favor. $(br2)When a total of 100 reputation points is obtained, a Vault God specific $(l)armor set$() is rewarded.
